description.en: A tear that Aen shed as he watched his friends go off into battle.
description.ar: A tear that Aen shed as he watched his friends go off into battle.
description.br: Uma lágrima derramada por Aenn quando ele observou seus amigos indo para a batalha.
description.cns: 阿利安诺为出战的同胞所流下的泪珠
description.de: (Jobquestitem) Die Träne stammt von Aenn, die mit ansehen mußte, wie ihre Freunde in den Krieg zogen.
description.fi: A tear that Aen shed as he watched his friends go off into battle.
description.fil: A tear that Aen shed as he watched his friends go off into battle.
description.fr: larmes versées par Aenn voyant ses compagnons partir à la guerre
description.id: Air mata yang ditumpahkan Aen saat dia melihat teman-temannya pergi berperang.
description.it: A tear that Aen shed as he watched his friends go off into battle.
description.jp: エーエンヌが最後の血戦に赴く仲間達の後姿を見つめながら流した涙が込められた宝玉。「流れよ我が涙、悲しみを洗い流したまえ」
description.kr: 에이엔느가 마지막 전장으로 향하는 동료들의 뒷모습을 보면서 흘린 눈물 방울.
description.nl: A tear that Aen shed as he watched his friends go off into battle.
description.pl: A tear that Aen shed as he watched his friends go off into battle.
description.ru: Слеза, которую обронил Киу, вспоминая о погибших товарищах.
description.sp: Una lágrima que derramó Aen al ver a sus amigos partir a la batalla.
description.sw: A tear that Aen shed as he watched his friends go off into battle.
description.th: แอ๊นน้ำตาไหลเมื่อเห็นเพื่อนๆ ออกรบ
description.tw: 艾恩為出戰的同胞所流下的淚珠
description.vi: Một giọt nước mắt mà Aen đã rơi khi chứng kiến những người bạn của mình ra trận.
